message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $130. It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. However, $90 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $110, which still gives you a great price for a valuable product.  Let's find a way to make this work.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the reduction, I am still unable to meet at $110. I would like to propose $100 as my maximum offer for the product.
